timeline.bodyText: You need to move the native test to src/native-test/java/org/acme/rest/json/NativeFruitResourceIT.java, this is a gradle specificity (for maven the file will be automatically moved to the test directory), maybe we need to add this to the doc..
timeline.author: ia3andy

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure but maybe better to use org.acme.resteasyjackson as package name?
